text: The mother's heart is the child's schoolroom.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

text: My mother taught me about the power of inspiration and courage, and she did it with a strength and a passion that I wish could be bottled.
author: Carly Fiorina

text: My mother taught me to treat a lady respectfully.
author: Chris Brown

text: I've been through it all, baby, I'm mother courage.
author: Elizabeth Taylor

text: Being a mother is hard and it wasn't a subject I ever studied.
author: Ruby Wax
